document_data.name: Syal Amandon
document_data.mainbody: '''Syal Amandol''' was a member of [[Zhentil Keep]]'s [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|Zhentil Keep]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.History: Syal was the youngest Lord on the Council. His father, [[Rorst Amandon]], was the [[Zhentilar]] battle lord and a ferocious opponent of [[Manshoon]], but died of poisoning in [[1334 DR]]. In fear for himself and his family, Syal pledged himself to the [[Zhentarim]]'s suggestions. His family controlled the trade of iron and weapons.
